dict.acceptation: 他/她/它们；人们，大家；政府，当局；她们；

sent.orig: As long as they're considered urrah, they can't really refuse our aid.
sent.trans: 只要they'reconsideredurrah(urrah什么意思？)，他们就不可能真正的拒绝我们的帮助。

sent.orig: They know they're ads and they know they're just commercial, yet they use them.
sent.trans: 他们知道这些是广告，他们也知道这是赞助链接，他们还是会用的。

sent.orig: They can buy anything they want, they can go anywhere they want, anytime they want.
sent.trans: 他们能买想要的所有东西。

sent.orig: They're running. They're dashing. They're jumping. But they stand for peace.
sent.trans: 他们在长跑，他们在短跑，他们在跳高跳远。但他们捍卫和平。

sent.orig: "No, they think they will, but they generally forget the marks, or else they die.
sent.trans: “不，他们是想再找的。可是，他们要不是忘记当初留下的标志，就是死了。
